text: South Sea Tales (1911) is a collection of short stories written by Jack London. Most stories are set in island communities, like those of Hawaii, or are set aboard a ship. ==List of Stories== *The House of Mapuhi *The Whale Tooth *Mauki *"Yah! Yah! Yah!" *The Heathen *The Terrible Solomons *The Inevitable White Man *The Seed of McCoy ==References== * Category:Short story collections by Jack London Category:1911 short story collections Category:Books about Oceania Category:Historical short story collections Category:Macmillan Publishers books Category:Oceania in fiction
title: South Sea Tales (London collection)
